title: Only, Only, Only (SCP-3999 Painting)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:the-foundation-theme |dark=--]]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=3999.png
| caption=A hand-painted depiction of SCP-3999 using spray paint, acrylic, and pen
| width=700px
| align=center]]

[[=]]
A painting created for a favorite of mine, SCP-3999! While created with initially acrylic paint and spraypaint, this painting also includes using a pen for the more finite details. This is the second of my paintings series I've made so far and was an overall joy to make with the smaller things I had included in the painting overall.
[[/=]]
